Preterit.text:
U zlam šġәšle hawna di ḥurma (İlyas p.c)the man confused the woman’s mind (she is not sure whether he is going to marry her)
lan=naʕime šġǝšše hawni ‘the children took away (?) my mind’ (by producing noize)

Infectum-wa.text: U malfono šoġašwa hawne dan naʕime. (he told them something strange) (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.text: Šğǝš hawni baḥ ḥaye du yulfono. (İlyas p.c) my mind has been confused by the life of learning.

Infectum.text: Uʕdo komәšġәš hawni. (İlyas p.c) Now my mind is being confused.
